p.span: Be sure to Like Shirland Community Consolidated School District #134 on Facebook and follow our postings.

div.p: Provide today’s students with the foundation for a lifetime of learning to fulfill his/her potential in tomorrow’s world.

ol.li:
Continuous improvement of…
Our students
Our staff
Our school building
Our community
Our selves
Meeting the academic, social, emotional, creative and physical needs of our students.
Good stewardship of our community’s resources.
Working to provide a safe, caring learning environment with high expectations for each student’s academic excellence.

div.p: Shirland School educates students from Kindergarten to 8th Grade. Shirland School is located in a rural setting conducive to health, safety and learning. We offer a rigorous academic curriculum, multiage instruction for 1st-2nd and 3rd-4th grades, an innovative balanced literacy program, I Ready personalized learning for reading and math, and a 1:1 initiative for 3rd thru 8th grades.

ul.li: 5th grade Beginner Band instrument rental provided by district
Spanish instruction is infused in Music classes for primary grades K-4
Intervention for reading, math, and written language
Second Step K-8 for social-emotional learning
Welcome Back to School Swim Party
All parents are encouraged to get involved

div.p: Shirland is a proud feeder district to Hononegah Community High School District 207. We are a part of the Hononegah Nation of schools (Rockton, Kinnikinnick, Prairie Hill, and Shirland School Districts). Although each district has its own identity, we all work closely together and are proud of our student achievement.

strong.em: Shirland offers a unique experience: a rural lifestyle that is still close to work – 30 minutes from Rockford, Illinois and just l5 minutes from Beloit, Wisconsin. We are just 9 minutes from Rockton and l5 minutes from Roscoe, Illinois. If you are searching for a small school with a big heart, look no further. We invite you to visit our school to see firsthand the rigorous academics and rich pursuits available for your greatest treasures: your children.
